titles.title: Deep down into the depths of this Thy Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Deep down into the depths of this Thy Name, My God, I sink and dwell in calm delight; Thou art enough however long the day, Thou art enough however dark the night.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thou art my God—the All-Sufficient One, Thou canst create for me whate’er I lack; Thy mighty hand has strewn the lonely track With miracles of love and tender care

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: For me Thy trusting one. My God I dare Once more to fling myself upon Thy breast, And there adore Thy ways in faith’s deep rest, And there adore Thy ways in faith’s quiet rest.
